divs: Sighting DetailsIt's hard to explain in words. They're all over the Hudson River Valley. Whoever they is. We have a pretty nice telescope, it's easy to spot them if you pay close enough attention. Keep your eyes peeled ;)
Summary: Shits going down in the Hudson Valley tonight
Object Shape: Boomerang, Disc, Fireball, Flash, Oval, Sphere, Star-like
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around April 3rd 2013
